animeTitle: Big Sister, I Don’t Want to Work Hard Anymore
otherNames: Big sister I don't want to try hard anymore, Big sister I don't want to work hard anymore, Sister I don't want to work hard anymore, 姐姐，我不想努力了
synopsis: An ordinary high school student, Su Ning, unexpectedly becomes entangled in a feud with evil spirits. Though fate seems unfair, it leads him to meet Ling Xi, a heavenly spirit master. With Ling Xi's help, Su Ning not only gradually learns to face challenges but also bravely takes on responsibility, embarking on a journey of cultivating merit and resolving the grudges of evil spirits.
